title: No module named _dl found in MAC OSX (with cuda and cudnn)
body_html:
Hi,

MACOSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET=10.9 CC=clang CXX=clang++ python setup.py install

After installing pytorch (which went in success), getting following error:

import torch
Traceback (most recent call last):
File "", line 1, in
File "torch/init.py", line 48, in
import torch._dl as _dl_flags
ImportError: No module named _dl

Have following libs in miniconda/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch:

_C.so _tensor_docs.py _thnn _utils.pyc distributed lib serialization.py storage.pyc version.py
init.py _tensor_docs.pyc _torch_docs.py autograd functional.py multiprocessing serialization.pyc tensor.py version.pyc
init.pyc _tensor_str.py _torch_docs.pyc backends functional.pyc nn sparse tensor.pyc
_dl.so _tensor_str.pyc _utils.py cuda legacy optim storage.py utils
body_text:
Hi,
MACOSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET=10.9 CC=clang CXX=clang++ python setup.py install
After installing pytorch (which went in success), getting following error:



import torch
Traceback (most recent call last):
File "", line 1, in 
File "torch/init.py", line 48, in 
import torch._dl as _dl_flags
ImportError: No module named _dl



Have following libs in miniconda/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch:
_C.so             _tensor_docs.py   _thnn             _utils.pyc        distributed       lib               serialization.py  storage.pyc       version.py
init.py       _tensor_docs.pyc  _torch_docs.py    autograd          functional.py     multiprocessing   serialization.pyc tensor.py         version.pyc
init.pyc      _tensor_str.py    _torch_docs.pyc   backends          functional.pyc    nn                sparse            tensor.pyc
_dl.so            _tensor_str.pyc   _utils.py         cuda              legacy            optim             storage.py        utils
body:
Hi,

MACOSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET=10.9 CC=clang CXX=clang++ python setup.py install

After installing pytorch (which went in success), getting following error:
>>> import torch
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
  File "torch/__init__.py", line 48, in <module>
    import torch._dl as _dl_flags
ImportError: No module named _dl

Have following libs in miniconda/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch:

_C.so             _tensor_docs.py   _thnn             _utils.pyc        distributed       lib               serialization.py  storage.pyc       version.py
__init__.py       _tensor_docs.pyc  _torch_docs.py    autograd          functional.py     multiprocessing   serialization.pyc tensor.py         version.pyc
__init__.pyc      _tensor_str.py    _torch_docs.pyc   backends          functional.pyc    nn                sparse            tensor.pyc
_dl.so            _tensor_str.pyc   _utils.py         cuda              legacy            optim             storage.py        utils
